lead_paragraph: HONIG--Eleanor Wiener, passed peacefully on May 14, 2016. Born January 4, 1932, she was married to William Honig, who predeceased her in 2015. She is survived by Stanton and Jody, Marc and Barbara and the grandchildren that gave her so much joy-Jacob, Sandy, Stephanie, Evan, Amanda and Max. She attended Hunter College and was a beloved Art teacher at PS 203 in Bayside. Her loving presence will be missed. Donations in her name can be made to http://www.freearts nyc.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HONIG, ELEANOR WIENER
